Parameters: int: Position of the item to prefetch.
int: Distance from the current viewport to the bounds of the item, must be non-negative.
addPosition(int, int).Description: Requests an an item to be prefetched, based on position, with a specified distance, indicating priority.

ClassDesc: Interface for LayoutManagers to request items to be prefetched, based on position, with specified distance from viewport, which indicates priority.
